prompt_base: Award-winning portrait of a battle-hardened man in his late 30s, intense cold blue eyes, short, rigid spiky dark blue hair, wearing high-tech composite battle armor, fierce expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 16k resolution, cinematic volumetric lighting, sharp focus, skin pores, individual metallic reflections on armor, hyperdetailed, professional studio lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, CGI, 3d render, plastic texture, smooth skin, toy, action figure, doll, bright yellow hair, flat lighting, low quality, bad anatomy, unnatural eyes
